com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess

Enum Chunking

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Chunking>
      • com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.Chunking
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Chunking>

    public enum Chunking
extends java.lang.Enum<Chunking>
    Chunking mode.
    See Also:
    PreProcessor.setChunking(com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.Chunking)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      AUTO
      Output a single chunk whatever the chunk specification found in the DITA map when the output media is Media.PRINT; follow the chunk specification found in the DITA map otherwise.
      NONE
      Output a single chunk whatever the chunk specification found in the DITA map.
      SINGLE
      Output a single chunk.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • NONE

        public static final Chunking NONE
        Output a single chunk whatever the chunk specification found in the DITA map.

      • SINGLE

        public static final Chunking SINGLE
        Output a single chunk. However unlike NONE do not systematically pull all the topics contained in a DITA file. Instead follow the chunk="select-document", chunk="select-tree", chunk="select-topic" specifications found in the DITA map.

        This mode allows to reuse a chunk specification designed to generate several chunks.

      • AUTO

        public static final Chunking AUTO
        Output a single chunk whatever the chunk specification found in the DITA map when the output media is Media.PRINT; follow the chunk specification found in the DITA map otherwise.
